Instance.description: A Social Group that contains a group of animals instead of humans.

TunableTuple.description: How long Sims wait before adjusting positions.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: main_social_lockout_time
Tunable.description: Amount of time main socials are locked out after one executes.

TunableList.name: main_social_tags
TunableList.description: If any of these Tags are found on mixers run in the social group it is considered to be a main social for the social group. In a Pet Group you're only allowed to have one of these running at a time.

TunableEnum.description: An individual Tag that's considered a main social by the social group.

TunableTuple.name: scoring_function
TunableTuple.description: The scoring function for this group.

Tunable.name: maximum_distance
Tunable.description: Any distance to another Sim over this amount scores zero.

Tunable.name: minimum_distance
Tunable.description: Any distance to another Sim under this amount scores zero.

Tunable.name: required_distance
Tunable.description: Any position that requires the Sim to move less than this amount scores zero. This encourages Sims to move.
